body:
I am trying to add a package called wrf.

http://forum.wrfforum.com/viewtopic.php?f=5&t=7099

Based on this instruction, it seems like netcdf-fortran and netcdf should be installed in the same directory to make wrf install successfully. But with spack they are in different directories. Is there a way to solve this problem?
title: How to deal with the situation when dependencies need to be in the same directory for successful installation?
